DOC.brief_summary: Self-reported healthy participant ( n=150 ) age 30-65 year 18.5 kg/m^2 â‰¤ BMI < 30 kg/m^2 randomly assign three group : low linoleic acid ( LA , 18:2n-6 ) group ( n=50 ) replace 10 mL soy oil one apple ; medium LA group ( control group , n=50 ) maintain usual food intake ; high LA group ( n=50 ) reduce 1/3 cup cook refined rice consume 9.9g soy oil capsule daily supplement . Plasma fatty acid lipoprotein-associated phospholipase A2 ( Lp-PLA2 ) activity measure baseline 8 week alongside cardiovascular disease risk factor .
DOC.brief_title: Impact 8-week Linoleic Acid Intake Soy Oil Lp-PLA2 Activity Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Age 30 65 year begin study Subjects BMI 18.5 30 kg/m^2 Use medication supplement alter lipid metabolism . Presence dyslipidemia , diabetes mellitus , hypertension , liver disease , renal disease , chronic disease gastrointestinal tract , cerebrovascular disease , pancreatitis cancer . Women pregnant lactating . Drug alcohol abuse .
